thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Peter B

author: Peter B
title: Peter B
text:
We've been with Servcorp for over a year now, and for a small business like ours they provide an excellent solution to our need for serviced offices, flexible workspace and a corporate presence. We have used their offices in several Australian cities, as well as elsewhere in the Asia-Pacific region, and the level of service has been wonderfully consistent and professional everywhere. Staff are always friendly and helpful and the office facilities give us all that we need. We've run marketing events from their offices and their support of this has been wonderful - we have no hesitation in inviting customers and prospects to meetings and events that we hold at Servcorp.
We have a contract for a package of services with them and the value is very good, but as with any service provider you need to monitor your usage carefully, as extra charges can build up if you use facilities outside your package agreement. The Servcorp staff are obviously carefully selected for their competence, professionalism and positive attitude, but I believe Servcorp could benefit by giving some more attention to diversity in their recruitment process.
If you are looking for serviced offices in the Asia-Pacific region, we wholeheartedly recommend Servcorp.
